name: Boozed n Busted
description:
Step into the shoes of a guy who got himself in trouble with the law after getting hooched up drunk due to a broken heart.


Its Boozed n Busted: A game about sobriety tests and Jason's (fictional character) quest to undo what he did just outta love.

Here's the game video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wQRTZLwvaX4

And game download links:

iOS - https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/boozed-n-busted!/id1097504820

Andorid - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com....
